de.a46.memory
Interface ParameterProvider

All Known Implementing Classes:
Starter
public interface ParameterProvider

Interface ParameterProvider bundles methods providing paths to external resources. Its implementation in class Starter returns information, that was passed from the embedding html-site via applet parameter tags.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Till Zoppke

Method Summary
 java.lang.String getAudioBase()
          Returns a String containing the relative path to the audio base directory.

          Returns a String containing the relative path to the background base directory.
